script.title: Monthly Budget Mover
script.description: Apply the previous month's budget/spend delta to the current month.
pitches: Saves on the time to manually move Insertion Order budgets from month to month.
instructions: No changes made can be made in DV360 from the start to the end of this process
Make sure there is budget information for the current and previous month's IOs in DV360
Make sure the provided spend report has spend data for every IO in the previous month
Spend report must contain 'Revenue (Adv Currency)' and 'Insertion Order ID'
There are no duplicate IO Ids in the categories outlined below
This process must be ran during the month of the budget it is updating
If you receive a 502 error then you must separate your jobs into two, because there is too much information being pulled in the sdf
Once the job has completed go to the table for the new sdf and export to a csv
Take the new sdf and upload it into DV360

dataset.description: Create a dataset where data will be combined and transfored for upload.

field.name: dataset
field.description: Place where tables will be created in BigQuery.

field.name: spend_report_id

field.name: budget_categories
field.description: A dictionary to show which IO Ids go under which Category. Please view the solutions page for information on format.

field.name: excluded_ios
field.description: A comma separated list of Inserion Order Ids that should be exluded from the budget calculations

field.name: filter_type
field.description: The filter type for the filter ids.

field.name: filter_ids
field.description: The filter ids for the request.

field.name: dataset
field.description: Dataset that you would like your output tables to be produced in.

field.description: The table name where the old sdf will be saved.

field.name: new_sdf_table_name
